get.summary: Gets a proposal data CSV for bulk upload based on an application form.
get.description: Returns a CSV file with two header rows: application form field IDs and application form field labels, in position order. This file can be used to prepare data for bulk upload.

parameters.name: applicationFormId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of an application form.

200.description: A CSV file with field ID and label header rows.

Content-Disposition.description: Suggests a filename for the downloaded file
